info.name: kong-template-with-docker
info.description: Fork from Kong Template... but with Docker / Docker compose to make your life a little easier by not having to install Kong (and Konga) locally to test or start developing  your own custom plugins in Lua or in JavaScript. This project have 2 custom plugins (one in Lua and the other in JS using kong-js-pdk) already configured and running in one route and is also using the newer 2.4.x kong release.
